```{r setup, include=FALSE}

  cache = TRUE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  echo = FALSE,
  comment = ' ',
  fig.align = "center",
  cache.path = '_cache/',
  fig.process = function(x) {
    x2 = sub('-\\d+([.][a-z]+)$', '\\1', x)
    if (file.rename(x, x2))
      x2
    else
      x
  }
)
```
